scripts.docker:install:mongodb: docker volume create --name=getskills-mongodata && docker run --name getskills-mongodb -v getskills-mongodata:/data/db -d -p 27017:27017 mongo
scripts.docker:start: docker start getskills-mongodb && docker start getskills-redis
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop getskills-mongodb && docker stop getskills-redis
scripts.docker:restart: docker restart getskills-mongodb && docker restart getskills-redis
